content: i got out of the navy in Oct 07 i was an E-5 jet engine mechanic and im thinking about joining the air force. is that even possible i heard the air force doesnt take people from different services.

content: Your best bet would be to post your question here: Joining the military or here: Air Force You might also want to ask about the Army's Blue to Green program Wishing you the best, please keep us posted. content: quote: Originally posted by buddylee199: i got out of the navy in Oct 07 i was an E-5 jet engine mechanic and im thinking about joining the air force. is that even possible i heard the air force doesnt take people from different services. If you're a good jet engine mechanic with no discipline problems, I have to guess Army Helicopter Units and Air Force aircraft units could use your skills and would want you, Regular, Guard, or Reserve. Getting somebody already trained saves a grundle of money, so they aren't going to turn a blind eye to that. Go in to any recruiter, go after what you want, and you'll get it. . . Good Luck! Wandering and Wondering
